title: Menu Sort
author: doino-gretchenliev
details:
Sorts items on Wii U Menu.

  	Please note this app requires additional files to run should you want to filter your sort .. please read the info at 
  	https://gbatemp.net/threads/wii-u-menu-sort.455132/
changelog:
1.2.0

Items count added.

1.1.0

Added support for backup and restore.

1.0.0
Dropped dontmove hex file and added support for dontmove text file.
Added new bad naming sorting mode.
Improve screen operations.

0.2.0

Added support for demo games(00050002).
The script ignores leading The in game's name.
Build against the latest devkit.
